text: Qasr Abu Hadi ( ') is a village with estimated 4,890 inhabitants in the Sirte District of Libya. It is 2 km east of the Gardabya Airport and 20 km south of Sirte. Former Libyan leader Muammar Gaddafi claimed to have been born in a goat-hair tent near the village on 7 June 1942. ==References== Category:Populated places in Sirte District
title: Qasr Abu Hadi
